stem: Перед использованием переносной угловой шлифмашины, какое check — mandatory?

choices.text: Удалить the guard to access tight spots
Использовать any wheel that fits the arbor
Verify the guard — fitted and the wheel RPM rating meets or exceeds tool RPM
Lubricate the wheel with oil for a smoother cut

rationales.CHOICE-3: A properly fitted guard and a wheel rated for the tool speed предотвращает wheel burst.
